title: Japan says it will dump radioactive water from crippled Fukushima nuclear plant into the Pacific, sparking protests
content:
1. Japan says it will dump radioactive water from crippled Fukushima nuclear plant into the Pacific, sparking protests  CBS News
  2. Japan to Dump Treated Radioactive Fukushima Water Into Ocean  Bloomberg Markets and Finance
  3. Fukushima: Japan announces it will dump contaminated water into sea  The Guardian
  4. Ramadan - What you should know  Yahoo Philippines News
  5. S. Korea, China strongly protest against Japan discharging Fukushima water; U.S. on different note  Arirang News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Japan says it will dump radioactive water from crippled Fukushima nuclear plant into the Pacific, sparking protests  CBS News
Japan to Dump Treated Radioactive Fukushima Water Into Ocean  Bloomberg Markets and Finance
Fukushima: Japan announces it will dump contaminated water into sea  The Guardian
Ramadan - What you should know  Yahoo Philippines News

localize.title: 日本が福島原発の放射能汚染水を太平洋に投棄すると発表し、抗議の声が上がる
日本称将把瘫痪的福岛核电站的放射性水倒入太平洋，引发抗议。
日本稱將把癱瘓的福島核電站的放射性水倒入太平洋，引發抗議。
